analysis.description:
BetstreakICO.BuyBSTtokens (/unique_chucks/38/0x25a4289eeba56c9fc1ec5376c83ecc7f930ed071.sol#226-258) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenReward.transfer(msg.sender,rewardTransferAmount) (/unique_chucks/38/0x25a4289eeba56c9fc1ec5376c83ecc7f930ed071.sol#249-253)

Reentrancy in BetstreakICO.BuyBSTtokens (/unique_chucks/38/0x25a4289eeba56c9fc1ec5376c83ecc7f930ed071.sol#226-258):
	External calls:
	- tokenReward.transfer(msg.sender,rewardTransferAmount) (/unique_chucks/38/0x25a4289eeba56c9fc1ec5376c83ecc7f930ed071.sol#249-253)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- fundValue (/unique_chucks/38/0x25a4289eeba56c9fc1ec5376c83ecc7f930ed071.sol#253-254)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/38/0x25a4289eeba56c9fc1ec5376c83ecc7f930ed071.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.11 (/unique_chucks/38/0x25a4289eeba56c9fc1ec5376c83ecc7f930ed071.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_fundingStartBlock' of BetstreakICO.SetupCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/38/0x25a4289eeba56c9fc1ec5376c83ecc7f930ed071.sol#131-132) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_fundingEndBlock' of BetstreakICO.SetupCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/38/0x25a4289eeba56c9fc1ec5376c83ecc7f930ed071.sol#132-133) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_amount' of BetstreakICO.beneficiaryMultiSigWithdraw (/unique_chucks/38/0x25a4289eeba56c9fc1ec5376c83ecc7f930ed071.sol#260) is not in mixedCase
